arm_group.description: ICD will be set to pre-LVAD settings post LVAD implant.
ICD will be set to ultra conservative settings post LVAD implant.

brief_summary.textblock:
We propose to study a strategy empirically applied for the past 6 months at a high volume
      LVAD center (Vanderbilt Heart and Vascular Institute). This utilizes an ultra conservative
      device programming strategy to maximize battery longevity, avoid inappropriate implantable
      cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) therapy, improve quality of life through reduction in
      overall shock burden, and potentially avoid unnecessary device generator changes prior to
      transplant. Avoiding CIED (cardiac implantable electronic device) change out device
      procedures prior to transplant is desirable.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Randomized Evaluation of an Ultra Conservative Approach to Implantable Defibrillator (ICD) Programming in Patients With a Left Ventricular Assist Device (LVAD).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion:

          -  Age ≥ 18

          -  Advanced Heart Failure

          -  Scheduled for Heartmate II LVAD implant

          -  With existing ICD

        Exclusion:

        -Age < 18

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Randomized Evaluation of an Ultra Conservative Approach to Implantable Defibrillator (ICD) Programming in Patients With a Left Ventricular Assist Device (LVAD).

primary_outcome.measure: Time to first ICD shock following LVAD implant

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of anti-tachycardia pacing (ATP) therapy administration for appropriate or inappropriate arrhythmia detection

secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients requiring ICD generator change
secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of ICD generator change prior to definitive therapy

secondary_outcome.description: Battery voltage and battery life measured in days
secondary_outcome.measure: Cardiac implantable electronic device (CIED) battery voltage/estimated longevity changes
Hospitalization frequency for decompensated congestive heart failure

secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients, post LVAD implant, to receive heart transplant and number of survival days post implant
secondary_outcome.measure: Determine survival to heart transplantation following LVAD implant

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Health Services Research
